case_title: United States of America v. Burwell
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Burwell

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute and distribution of marijuana

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the BOP for a term of 60 months to run concurent with defendants undischarged term imposed in Lucas County Court of Common Pleas Case No. (CR98-03010). 5 years supervised release. $100.00 special assessment.
